data.title: Michael Cook - 2023 - Baseball
data.meta_description:
Michael Cook (13) IF  - Career Achievements


	2023 All-NEWMAC second team
	2023 CSC Academic All-District
	2021, 2022, 2023 NEWMAC Academic All-Conference


Career
data.text:
Career Achievements

2023 All-NEWMAC second team

2023 CSC Academic All-District

2021, 2022, 2023 NEWMAC Academic All-Conference

Career Highlights

2023: As a senior, started all 41 games he appeared in…batted a career-best .335 with four doubles, two triples and three homers to go along with career-highs of 30 RBI and 23 runs scored…also walked 18 times and swiped a career-best six bases…had a .418 on-base percentage and a .445 slugging percentage…was third on the team with 14 multi-hit games and second on the squad with eight multi-RBI games…began the season with a 12-game hitting streak between February 25-March 26…batted .500 (6-for-12) with two doubles and six RBI in a three-game series to open the season at Trinity (Texas) on February 25-26…had an RBI single in a 7-4 win over Denison on March 11…singled, drove in a run and walked three times in a 16-0 victory over Wooster on March 16…went 2-for-4 with two stolen bases in a 7-0 win over Nichols on March 22…recorded a season-high four hits and drove in a run in a 10-2 triumph over Salem State in game one of a doubleheader on March 26…tripled, walked and drove in three runs in a 7-4 win at Springfield in the nightcap of a twin bill on April 2…knocked in two runs in a 16-10 slugfest at UMass Dartmouth on April 3…went 2-for-4 with an RBI and two runs scored in a 13-0 rout of Brandeis on April 5…finished 2-for-5 with two RBI in an 11-7 victory over Southern Maine on April 13…was 5-for-11 (.545) with three RBI, three walks and five runs scored in a three-game series with Emerson on April 14-15…went 3-for-4 with two RBI and hit the go-ahead home run in the 12th inning of a 7-6 win at Clark on April 18…was 4-for-10 (.400) with a double at the plate in a three-game series against Wheaton on April 28-29…hit a solo homer in a 4-2 victory at Clark in the opening round of the NEWMAC Tournament on May 6…went 3-for-5 with a run scored in a 9-3 conference tournament victory over Wheaton on May 7…went 2-for-4 with a double and knocked in both runs in a 10-2 loss to Wheaton in the NEWMAC final on May 8.

2022: As a junior, appeared in 23 games making 18 starts…batted .219 with two doubles, two homers, 11 RBI and eight runs scored…also recorded a career-high 10 walks…went 2-for-6 with two doubles, two walks, an RBI and two runs scored in the final two games of a three-game set to open the season at Trinity (Texas) on February 26-27…was 3-for-4 with an RBI and two runs scored in a 10-0 win over Plymouth State on March 21…went 2-for-3 with an RBI in a 10-1 triumph over Framingham State on March 23…finished 3-for-9 with a homer and five RBI to help the Beavers sweep a doubleheader at Salem State on March 26…singled twice in a 4-3 loss at Roger Williams on March 31…homered and walked twice in a 7-2 loss to UMass Dartmouth on April 4…singled, drove in a run and scored in a 9-5 loss at Southern Maine on April 24.

2021: As a sophomore, appeared in 11 games and made nine starts...batted .270 with four doubles, two home runs, seven RBI and eight runs scored on the year...went 0-for-2 with a run scored in his collegiate debut, a 13-2 win over WPI on March 27...produced a two-run pinch-hit homer in game one and went 2-for-5 with a double and an RBI in game two as the Beavers swept Coast Guard on April 3...hit a go-ahead home run in the sixth inning of a 5-3 victory over Wheaton to conclude a four-game series on April 18...went 2-for-3 with a double and three RBI in an 11-8 win that helped Babson sweep Springfield in the NEWMAC Tournament semifinals on May 8...went 4-for-12 with two doubles and three runs scored in the best-of-three NEWMAC Tournament Championship Series against Wheaton on May 15-16.
